channel.title: Witcher 3
channel.description: I decided to get it because I heard good things. So far the visuals are stunning, story is pretty great, and I really enjoy the combat. It's freaking challenging at times though and reminds me a bit of Dark Souls. I'll get stuck at a part for a good while because certain shit is hard to fight. Anyone own it?

item.title: Witcher 3
item.dc:creator: @LegoApple LegoApple
item.description:
@LegoApple wrote:

Witcher 3 is probably the best looking game I ever played and greatest.

item.title: Witcher 3
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:9, topic:551900”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=670815.msg4485799#msg4485799 date=1433913659]
I got a key for it for free when I bought my graphics card, haven’t got around to playing it yet. I haven’t played the first two, is 3 worth getting into the series for?
[/quote]
Hopefully you’ve redeemed that code, or are going to because they do expire. I got the same thing when I ordered my 960[/quote]Yes I redeemed it immediately, same with the new batman game.

I’ll probably try it out soon

item.title: Witcher 3
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

You don’t have to play the others first to understand everything, if that’s what you’re asking. Just watch all cutscenes without skipping and pay attention and you’ll understand. 3 is definitely worth it if you haven’t played the others. The game becomes a ton more fun when you understand the combat.

Read full topic

The graphics looks FANTASTIC but I could never get into the series. I downloaded Witcher 2 from Xbox Live Gold thing when it was being handed out but I was never able to get into it.

item.title: Witcher 3
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

A really good looking game, that’s for sure. I get around 40 FPS with everything maxed out, and with everything but post-processing at highest settings I can pull off a constant 60FPS.

iirc that screenshot was taken with everything at max except for Nvidia Hairworks.

Read full topic

item.title: Witcher 3
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

It’s a really, really great game. Combat is weirdly more difficult at the start than towards the end, they haven’t balanced the game too well, it generally gets a lot easier as it goes on.

That being said, it is one of my favourite games in quite a while, despite the issues it has.

Read full topic
